update people_daily
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audio_play_time = #{audioPlayTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audio_url = #{audioUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date_time = #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
share_url = #{shareUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
seminar_id = #{seminarId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update people_daily set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audio_play_time = #{audioPlayTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audio_url = #{audioUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date_time = #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, share_url = #{shareUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, seminar_id = #{seminarId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update people_daily set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audio_play_time = #{audioPlayTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audio_url = #{audioUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date_time = #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, share_url = #{shareUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seminar_id = #{seminarId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO people_daily (id, title, audio_play_time, audio_url, comment_count, date_time, share_url, content, seminar_id) VALUES ( #{map.id}, #{map.title}, #{map.audio_play_time}, #{map.audio_url}, #{map.comment_count}, #{map.news_timestamp,typeHandler=com.lee1314.peopledaily.commons.handler.DateTypeHandler}, #{map.share_url}, #{map.content}, #{map.seminarId} )
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM people_daily where seminar_id = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO people_daily (id, title, audio_play_time, audio_url,comment_count, date_time, share_url, content, seminar_id) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{audio_play_time}, #{audio_url}, #{comment_count}, #{news_timestamp,typeHandler=com.lee1314.peopledaily.commons.handler.DateTypeHandler}, #{share_url}, #{content}, #{seminarId})
